mapper.select: SELECT U.USER_NUM, U.USER_NICK, U.USER_MONITER, U.USER_CARRER, COUNT(DISTINCT A.ARTICLE_ID) AS ARTICLE_COUNT, COUNT(DISTINCT C.COMMENT_ID) AS COMMENT_COUNT, COUNT(DISTINCT B.BADGE_ID) AS BADGE_COUNT FROM TBL_USER U LEFT JOIN TBL_ARTICLE A ON U.USER_NUM = A.USER_NUM LEFT JOIN TBL_COMMENT C ON U.USER_NUM = C.USER_NUM LEFT JOIN TBL_BADGE B ON U.USER_NUM = B.USER_NUM WHERE U.USER_NUM = 3 GROUP BY U.USER_NUM, U.USER_NICK, U.USER_MONITER, U.USER_CAREER;
